name: Lawyer Tega
description:
Submission made for the Scorespace Jam #14

Are you in need of merging two companies for fun and profit? 

Well, you Better Call Tega! Play as Lawyer Tega, a veteran of company merging with over fifty years of experience in the field. Unfortunately, companies rarely agree on the terms to perform the merge by. It is your job to make them come to an agreement! You only have time for a few merges, make them count!

(All scripts, music and models were created from scratch)

Programming by  https://hex08.itch.io/ and https://nickfrex.itch.io/

Music by https://hex08.itch.io/

3D art by https://cialdi.itch.io/
